name: Feichang Niu
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: Based on the ancient Greek Athenian concept of democratic self-governance, FCN uses blockchain technology to build a decentralized intelligent ecosystem to achieve community self-governance. with DeFi as the underlying technology, FCN helps global blockchain enthusiasts, products and individuals achieve a more open and decentralized self-governance operation through the decentralized on-chain system built, and through the FCNswap decentralized exchange, it meets the community members' various business needs through FCNswap decentralized exchange.
